mapper.select: select a.id, a.employee_id, a.specialist_id , b.name as `name` , c.name as `specialistName`, a.interviewer_start_time, a.interviewer_end_time, a.interview_place from nl_employee_intview_info as a ,nl_employee_info b,nl_specialist_info c where a.employee_id=b.employee_id and a.specialist_id=c.id
